entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 11:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 except gusting to 150 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
